name: One Dungeon - LD37
description:
Fight as a knight, solve puzzles as a wizard and journey into a dungeon.

W A S D - To move
Space - To switch characters

Left Click - Attack / Interact

A knight and wizard venture off to defeat a mysterious gigantic monster deep in a local dungeon down the road. The knight, only competent with a blade, sought out the a great wizard to guide him through his greatest weakest: Doors. Being a graduate of West Magicplace University, majoring in Switches & Door Wizardry, the wizard enthusiastically joined the knight on his quest.

Where credit is due:

Programmer: @DrkrWasTaken
Programmer: Hazmeister
Art: appl3
Music: ksynhc

Patches:

1.1 - Fixed various enemy pathing not allowing the player to progress.
1.2 - Fixed Victory message not appearing
